message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $11,500. I believe it will be very valuable to you.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking of a price around $10,500. Would you be willing to consider that?
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While I'm willing to negotiate, $10,500 is too low for me. Could you meet me at $11,000?
I understand your position, Alice. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $10,750. Would that be acceptable to you?
